content.question: Which of the following best describes the behavior of this code segment?

choices.label: str1  is modified by the call to  mystery;  str1  and  str2  are equal in value after executing the code segment.
str1  is modified by the call to  mystery;  str1  and  str2  have differing values after executing the code segment.
str1  is not modified by the call to  mystery;  str1  and  str2  are equal in value after executing the code segment.
str1  is not modified by the call to  mystery;  str1  and  str2  have differing values after executing the code segment.

content.answer: str1  is not modified by the call to  mystery;  str1  and  str2  have differing values after executing the code segment.

topic.text: 3.6: Methods: Passing and Returning References of an Object

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
